description: User Can book a product and pay the product through stripes
If the product is sold then others will see the product unavailable and buyer will see paid
A user can sign in as seller also and add product to the website. Admin can verify a seller and verified seller product will have a blue tick.
Seller can delete and advertise his/her items. Advertised products are seen on the advertised products on the home page
Admin can see all buyers all, seller and reported items. Admin can delete any buyer seller and reported items from the website.
User Can see nav,hero,items and some other feature section in the home page
By clicking on see all on items of home page, user will be redirected to all items.
There will be cards of all items and by clicking show details user will be redirected to item details page.

On the item details page user can see the details of item. There is a review section where user can give review to the specific item and user can see the reviews of other users also.User can not give review if he/she is not logged in.
There a is *Add a service* page where user can a item and it will be showed to the all items page.
User can see his given reviews to My Reviews Page
